title: My account got hacked.
body:
My account got hacked. Please help me.
I had almost all skin on my account with 10k + riot point.
I do not know how, but it showed my account has transferred to another region.
and I couldnt login.
somehow I could login from chrome. but I cannot login from explorer.
and in the match history, there is some chinese name on.

I need help riot, I played this account 4 years and I did not share once.

replies.body:
Ouch, I'm sorry to hear that. :(

If you submit a support ticket with [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide as much information as you can recall, we'll be able to assist you in sorting this out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
That sucks, I hope you get your account back and everything gets sorted out!
